contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "we will put to death" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: will be put to death

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Yahweh cut off the waters of the Jordan in front of the ark of his covenant" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The waters of the Jordan were cut off before the ark of the covenant of Yahweh

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated with an active form. Alternate translation: "You must set apart to Yahweh the city and all that is in it for destruction" or "You must set apart to Yahweh the city and all that is in it by destroying it" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The city and all that is in it will be set apart to Yahweh for destruction

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated with an active form. Alternate translation: "the one whom Yahweh selects" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the one who is selected

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Yahweh selected the tribe of Judah" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the tribe of Judah was selected

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "I hid them in the ground" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: They are hidden in the ground

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The city leaders called all the people in the city together" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: All the people who were in the city were called together

contextId.occurrenceNote: Messengers came and told Joshua. Alternate translation: "Someone told Joshua" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: It was told to Joshua

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "which the Canaanites now consider their property" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: which is considered property of the Canaanites

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "that the priests burned with fire" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: made by fire

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "that Moses gave to each of their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: given to each of their clans

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Moses assigned it" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: It was assigned

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Moses assigned these" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: These were assigned

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Eleazar, Joshua, and the tribal leaders cast lots to determine the inheritance" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Their inheritance was selected by lot

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "And Moses did not give a portion of the inheritance to the Levites in the land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The Levites were given no portion of the inheritance in the land

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The territory ... that Joshua assigned to their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The territory of the tribe of Ephraim, clan by clan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "which Joshua assigned to their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: clan by clan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the cities that Joshua had chosen" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the cities that were chosen

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the Israelites forced these people to work as slaves" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: these people were made to do forced labor

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Joshua assigned the land of Gilead and Bashan to Makir's descendants" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Makir's descendants were assigned the land of Gilead and Bashan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Joshua assigned land ... and gave them to their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Land was assigned ... given to their clans

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Joshua assigned ten parcels of land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Ten parcels of land were assigned

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Joshua assigned the land of Gilead" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The land of Gilead was assigned

contextId.occurrenceNote: Possible meanings are 1) that the border of Manasseh's land on the north side touched the land that belonged to the tribe of Asher or 2) that one can travel north to reach Asher. Alternate translation: "Asher was on the north side" or "One can travel north to reach Asher" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: On the north side Asher can be reached

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "to each tribe Joshua gave their portion in the land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: to each was given his portion of the land

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Joshua gave it to each of their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: it was given clan by clan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "which Joshua gave to their clans" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: clan by clan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the portion of land which Joshua assigned to the tribe of Judah" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the portion of land assigned to the tribe of Judah

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The tribe of Benjamin gave Gibeon" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the tribe of Benjamin were given Gibeon

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "they received cities" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: they had cities given to them

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The tribe of Dan gave to the clan of Kohath Eltekeh" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the tribe of Dan, the clan of Kohath was given Eltekeh

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The half tribe of Manasseh gave to the clan of Kohath Taanach" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the half tribe of Manasseh, the clan of Kohath was given Taanach

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The half tribe of Manasseh, other Levite clans, received from the half tribe of Manasseh Golan" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the half tribe of Manasseh, to clans of Gershon, these were other Levite clans, and they gave Golan

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The clans of Gershon also received Kishion" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: To the clans of Gershon they also gave Kishion

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "They received from the tribe of Asher Mishal" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the tribe of Asher, they gave Mishal

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The clans of Gershon received from the tribe of Naphtali Kedesh" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: From the tribe of Naphtali, they gave the clans of Gershon Kedesh

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: The rest of the Levites—the clans of Merari—received from the tribe of Zebulun Jokneam" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: To the rest of the Levites—the clans of Merari—were given out of the tribe of Zebulun: Jokneam

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The clans of Merari received from the tribe of Reuben Bezer" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: To the clans of Merari were given from the tribe of Reuben: Bezer

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "They received from the tribe of Gad Ramoth" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Out of the tribe of Gad they were given Ramoth

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The clans of Merari also received Heshbon" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The clans of Merari were also given Heshbon

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "they received these twelve cities by the casting of lots" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: twelve cities in all were given to them by the casting of lots

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The Levites received their cities from the middle of the land" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: The cities of the Levites taken from the middle of the land
